subtitle: This cider braised cabbage is perfectly contrasted with the crunchy walnuts. Perfect for Christmas lunch.

method.text: Heat the oil and butter together in a large saucepan. Add the onion. Fry for 3 min or until softened.
Stir in the cabbage. Fry for 3 min. Stir in the cider and seasoning. Cover. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 8-10 min or until tender.
Stir in the walnut halves. Cook for 2 min. Drain slightly. Spoon into a warmed serving dish.

title: Braised cabbage and walnuts
